|brand = Buffalo |model = WAPS-APG600H |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = FDI000000004,FDI04604022-0 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3662; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 12 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = RJ-45 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = BUFFALO-XXXXXX_A,BUFFALO-XXXXXX_G |defaultssid_regex = ^BUFFALO-[A-F0-6]{6}_A$,,,^BUFFALO-[A-F0-6]{6}_G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/13/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 163120655113 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00B7N580G |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Ralink;RT3092; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This FCC ID appears to be used for both the WAPS-APG600H (Dual-band concurrent) and the WAPS-AG300H (Dual-band selectable).
"1244-00000854-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Per the FCC manual, the default SSID patterns are presumed to be '''BUFFALO-XXXXXX_A''' and '''BUFFALO-XXXXXX_G''' ('''XXXXXX''' being the last three octets of some MAC used by the unit, upper case hex digits) . The devices are also presumed to use a 10:6F:3F ('''Buffalo''') OUI.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
